Reviews.Title: Time to move the router
Reviews.Author: Chris H
Reviews.Content: I got this TV over Black Friday weekend 2011.  Out of the box it seems like a good value--light weight, clear picture--but it's NOT wi-fi enabled like I assumed.  Not a huge issue, because it's easy enough to move the router closer, but it's not very clear from the description.  Hooked it up to my new xbox and to my computer, and they all work well together right out of the box.Update 2/2/12I got a second router and set it up as a bridged client, FINALLY getting internet to this TV.  Surprisingly, there are a lot more apps on it than I thought--they're all accessible through Vudu and include Facebook, Picasa, TED Talks, and several news apps.  After 3 months of owning this TV, I'm far more satisfied than I thought I would be, and I'm upgrading my rating from 4 to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: *NOT* WiFi!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Fowler
Reviews.Content: Just got this on the Cyber-Sunday deal for only $250 so I shouldn't complain, but I'll bet I wasn't the only one who assumed that the built-in Internet apps meant this TV had WiFi capability.Nope!Get out your hyper-long RJ45 cables, because this puppy only works via Ethernet. Welcome back to the 20th century...

Reviews.Title: For  $217.00 it was a GREAT purchase ..!!
Reviews.Author: Mike Toneff
Reviews.Content: Everything I buy depends on what I get for what I paid for it. This 32 inch HDTV was a great purchase for $ 217.00 with free shipping through Amazon. The installation went up on the wall and the picture looks great. I did not notice any sound issues as some others had posted..... speakers sound good. One of the features I liked being that I recently canceled cable and set up a Antenna .. was this TV will allow you to see the signal strength for each channel. Amazon had the TV at my front door within 2 days of my purchase.....I am pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Tammy Gada
Reviews.Content: Bought this on the Black Friday lightning deals. TV out of the box was great, the only disappointing thing like many other people was that its not Wi-Fi enabled. You need to run Ethernet cables. I bought this for my daughter's room and she loves it, especially since the netflix feature is right on the remote. All in all, great TV at the price point.

Reviews.Title: Great deal, awesome quality
Reviews.Author: J. Ayre
Reviews.Content: For us closet Luddites, this value-priced set (on sale) had alot to offer for the features, variety of connections and overall build quality.  It set up in 5 mins which I appreciated. Haven't tried out the NetFlix integration, but hope to start streaming this weekend. For those who want a sleek, budget-priced 32"-inch LCD, I can recommend this set. Others have noted the tinny sound quality, but I prob couldn't afford a TV with better speakers that I would never use anyways.

Reviews.Title: TV ok but no code to connect to Dish remote!
Reviews.Author: angelwings4me
Reviews.Content: None of the codes in the book of codes twelve bigillion has one that will work for this tv with Dish Network, the idea of having to use two remotes to operate this just may prove reason enough for a return, not to mention the sound really is bad. My old tube tv had just as good a picture and a better sound system for sure!  Does anyone have any ideas on how to get the proper code? Was online with Dish they don't have a clue and say it's up to the manufacturers to provide them with a code? Help!

Reviews.Title: Good tvs
Reviews.Author: WiseShopper
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these over 2 years ago and they still works fine. Not the best quality images but overall can't complain for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, BUT
Reviews.Author: Nico33 "Nico33"
Reviews.Content: Works well but less than 6 months of limited use and the remote control has stopped working. If anyone knows which Samsung code works with the TV can you please comment to this review with the code?

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for a TV with internet apps
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Cao
Reviews.Content: After 5 months of ownership, I can finally put in a credible review. I love this TV because I can finally stream my Netflix movies without hooking up my laptop or some ROKU equivalent hardware. However, you do need to have an ethernet connection to a router. If you're next to one then there's nothing else to buy. If not, you will want invest in a repeater or powerline ethernet adapter. The decent adapters start around $60. Picture quality is crisp and rich. The speakers are substantially powered. It's a good size for my 10x10 room. You won't find any Internet Apps TV's at this price.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY THIS TV or BRAND!!! REMOTE GOES BAD
Reviews.Author: Rae
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my parents in Dec. 2011... love the tv but within 3 weeks the remote quit working.Returned TV to Amazon and the within a couple of weeks the remote quit again.Called Isymphony and it took 4 weeks to get a new remote.Well it is now Feb. 28 and 2 TV's and 3 remotes later the replacement remote quit again!Customer service is really a person so that was a nice change  - way to step it up isymphony but make a REMOTE control that works!

Reviews.Title: Great tv, great price
Reviews.Author: F. Albertson "fdajr"
Reviews.Content: This tv is a great one for the kids or the bedroom! Arrived on time and works super! Highly reccomend to anyone needing additional tv

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: James Ray Perkins "jimbop71"
Reviews.Content: i purchased this tv a month ago, and its got a great pic after adjusting , just curious if the usb port can run a wireless internet on this , if anyone has done it let us know if it works. good sound for the tv , good buy so far. remote progaming for direct tv was very simple. im happy with the buy

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: J. Cunningham
Reviews.Content: I read most of the reviews for this product before buying. This was a helpful resource to me when it came to programming the remote  You need to use the Samsung name  We setup the tv with no problem and it's been great all around ever since.  I may buy another one for the man cave.

Reviews.Title: Picture is a little blurry.
Reviews.Author: N. Robinson
Reviews.Content: I can't complain about the lack of WiFi, it's pretty clear from the packaging that it is not included.  Seems reasonably well built given the low price.  Picture is somewhat blurry though. Remote is awkward to hold in your hand.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: B. Murrell "Shopping Mom"
Reviews.Content: The iSymphony is a great quality TV.  Looking for a larger TV for the living room.  Would purchase this brand again.

ProductInfo.Features:
32" wide-screen with 1366 x 768 native resolution for HD performance
Integrated ATSC/NTSC TV tuner for digital and analog broadcast reception
Easy access to Internet-Apps to enjoy videos, sports, games, and much more
3 HDMI inputs for true digital connections
ProductInfo.Name: iSymphony LC32IH60C 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV with Internet Apps
